promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi cute basic beetle dark-type pokemon with a amethyst crystal core. It can be found in crypt-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, dark or beetle. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Cryptamyst, a a chibi cute basic beetle dark-type pokemon. It can be found in crypt-like environments It has the following abilities: Dark Resolve, Coil. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "beetle", "dark" or "Cryptamyst". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of dark-type pokemon, beetle-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, dreamy background
generatedDescription: This nocturnal creature dwells in secluded, tomb-like habitats. Cryptamyst uses Dark Resolve and Coil to navigate its gloomy world.
